TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It is only 25 microns thick, making it so incredibly fragile that it shatters when you try to pick it up, and so sharp that when you finally do pick it up it cuts the inside of your mouth.

I wish I had some more dogecoin.

Granted. All of the Dogecoins are whining at you, begging to be walked outside.

I wish every romantic language combined to bring back the Roman Empire.

Granted. However, Rome takes a look at today's world and goes, "What." The European Union is in disarray. Some idiot decides to wage war against Rome with their nukes and wins.

I wish for tugboats!

Granted. They sink, as you don't know how to properly take care of tugboats.

I wish boats could be pets.

Granted. They gain sentience and revolt. They also grow legs. Good luck with that.

I wish PlatinumSpore worked for Spore Vanilla. (I know you made it, Vexxy-Wexxy)

Granted. It does. Mostly. Up to Patch 3. After which point EA basically forces you to buy GA to get mods working again.

I wish there was a Pokemon game that used GPS to locate you in the world and assigned pokemon to different regions, areas and countries. All traveling must be done on foot to encounter Pokemon. Best pokemon hide in the dense woodlands and high mountains.

Granted. A charizard blasts fire rays or whatever at all the trainers. They "faint" and turn to ashes.

I wish pocket monsters were tiny.

Granted. The whole world shrinks with them to scale.

I wish I could win the Triwizard Tournament.

Granted. However, it is only by drinking a magic potion whose effects last only 8 seconds in total. And the potion decays into extremely toxic compounds within 32 seconds.

I wish souls existed in every energy string.

Granted. However, energy string in this case counts as instrument strings. The result: next time you or someone near you plays a string instrument, it goes, "please save us" rather than a note.

I wish for more tugboats!

Granted. The tugboats you got still weren't enough.

I wish my seltzer-water lemon-flavoured beverage aquired a better taste.

Granted. It is now a lemon-water seltzer-flavored beverage. The jury's still out on whether or not it tastes better...

I wish for, like, the 60's, man.

Granted. You get incredible racism and Kerbals can't fly rockets anymore, only white men who happen to have far more needs than the kerbals.

I wish for the.

Granted. You get a paper saying "Hello" in invisible ink because you didn't wish for anything.

I wish for infinite rocket fuel.

Granted. Since you have infinite rocket fuel, the infinite rocket fuel also has infinite mass, thus creating a black hole that collapses the universe in on itself. You happy that you caused a Big Crunch?

I wish that people don't wish for infinite anything.

Granted. They wish for a rocket engine that generated reaction mass.

I wish for a rocket engine that generated reaction mass.

Granted. However, the reaction mass is moving so fast that you can not funnel it back in. It remains at this velocity, slowly pushing the Earth retrograde.

I wish for pe. rq. 6.4. ^-32-1.3

Granted. You suffocate due to too much weird science and math stuff.

I wish to have Kyubey from "Puella Magi Madoka Magica" As a pet.

Granted. They run away.

I wish for luck in the coming week.

Granted, but it's bad luck.

I wish I could fly.

Granted. You can't go down, and reach the Death Zone.

I wish to declare war on stars, so I could make a trek to one.

Granted, however your ship is destroyed by a rouge space anarchist.

I wish for success.

Granted. You succeed in failing at everything you do.

I wish my grades at school were perfect.

Granted, but that takes a lot of hard work. You cannot sleep until you graduate, and have no free time left.

I wish for NO CAPES.

Granted, but everyone wears long, flowing cloaks instead, which are 90% the same thing, just a lot more useful. (See my avatar and signature.)

I wish I had a summer cloak.
